titleStmt.title: A description of the Roman Catholick Church wherein the pretentions of it's [sic] head, the manners of his court, and principles, and doctrines, the worship and service, the religious orders and houses, the designs and practises of that Church, are represented in a vision / by Iohn Barclay, minister at Cruden ; written in the year 1679.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, John, d. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
